branding.tagline: Your CRM system is often the first data source to include in analytics. Using this Block not only provides fast time to value to get your first reports out to your sales leaders and executives, but also creates a foundation to build and expand reporting.

SFDC_domain.label: Salesforce domain URL
SFDC_domain.description: If you are using Salesforce, enter the base part of the URL in single quotes, such as 'keboola.lightning.force.com' - keep empty otherwise

hubspot_account_id.label: Hubspot Account ID
hubspot_account_id.description: If you are using Hubspot, enter your account ID in single quotes, such as '505715' - keep empty otherwise

pipedrive_domain.label: Pipedrive Domain
pipedrive_domain.description: If you are using Pipedrive, enter your domain in single quotes, such as 'keboola.pipedrive.com' - keep empty otherwise
